attributes.action: ANPR Used on Petrol Forecourts to prevent Fuel being sold to UnTaxed vehicles
attributes.additional_details: Every petrol station should use ANPR technology linked to DVLA/HMRC  to check if a vehicle is currently taxed &/or MOT'd.  If the vehicle is not taxed/MOT'd then the sale of fuel should be prohibited. Obviously this wouldn't prevent offenders from filling petrol cans but will certainly make it more difficult for them.  The system should be "Closed" so that it can not be used by a third party to look up details about the driver.
